overview: As cold and destructive in the Octagon as his nickname, 'The Iceman', would indicate, UFC Light Heavyweight Champion Chuck Liddell's concussive knockout power has struck fear in the hearts of opponents for close to a decade. Witness his journey from promising newcomer to his unquestioned status as the premier pound for pound fighter in the mixed martial arts world today.
title: The Ultimate Iceman: Chuck Liddell
